message: Let's start fair. I propose we split it 60/40.  What do you say?
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me.  I'm willing to give you 30 dollars if I get 70. This is your last chance for a decent offer, Alice, as the money will be worth less with each round.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 40/60 this time.  We both get a fair share, and we can avoid losing more money to inflation.
